mapper.insert:
select apply_seq.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_apply(apply_seq, ref_annseq, ref_resumeseq) values(#{applySeq}, #{refAnnseq}, #{refResumeseq})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_apply where ref_annseq=#{refAnnseq} and ref_resumeseq=#{refResumeseq}
mapper.select: select tc.com_name as COMNAME, tc.com_type as COMTYPE, tap.reg_date as REGDATE, ta.ann_title as TITLE, ta.ANN_ENDT - ta.ANN_STDT as TIME, ta.salary as SALARY, ta.career_type as CAREER, ta.employee_type as EMPLOYEE, tr.resume_title as RESUME, ta.ann_seq as ANNSEQ from TBL_RESUME tr join TBL_APPLY tap on tr.resume_seq=tap.ref_resumeseq join TBL_ANNOUNCEMENT ta on tap.ref_annseq=ta.ann_seq join TBL_COMPANY tc on tc.com_seq=ta.ref_companyseq where tr.ref_memberseq=#{memberSeq}
